title: Premiere: Britt Margit – Wake Up In New York
content:
Having spent the past few months piecing together her debut album, expected on indie label Birdland next year, Britt Margit is gearing up to leave a lasting impact on 2017. This latest taster, a cover of Craig Armstrong’s Wake Up In New York, recorded during a gruelling evening in the studio, focuses the spotlight on her sensational, gripping vocal. Accompanied by a strikingly uncomplicated yet effective video, it’s a poignant representation of the powerful vulnerability that Margit possesses. Check out Wake Up In New York below.
